text: Cristiane Brasil Francisco, commonly known as Cristiane Brasil (born 21 December 1973), is a Brazilian lawyer and politician. She was a member of the Brazilian Labor Party (PTB). She was a Federal Deputy between 2015 and 2019. Brasil was nominated as Minister of Labour in January 2018, but the Federal Justice suspended her nomination. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Rio de Janeiro (state) Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:People from Petr√≥polis
title: Cristiane Brasil
